name: gracex-brain-api
description: GRACE-X Level 5 Brain API Backend - Multi-provider LLM integration

scripts.health: curl -s http://localhost:3000/health | node -e "process.stdin.on('data',d=>console.log(JSON.parse(d).status==='ok'?'✓ Server healthy':'✗ Server unhealthy'))"
scripts.setup: node -e "require('fs').copyFileSync('env.example.txt','.env');console.log('Created .env - please edit with your API keys');"

author: GRACE-X AI
